page.title: 17A Day in the Life Of...
page.content: I GET UP AT 7.30AM ON SCHOOL DAYS AND GET READY AND WASHED.I GET MY GYM GEAR READY FOR SCHOOL AND THEN I GET NMY COAT ON AND 30p FOR SCHOOL.WHEN I GET TO THE BUS STOP I CATCH THE BUS TO SCHOOL IT TAKES ABOUT FIVE MINUTES TO GET TO SCHOOL.WHEN WE GOT TO SCHOOL WE HAVE TO WAIT A WHILE BEFORE WE GO INTO SCHOOL.THE SCHOOL IS BIG IT HAS A HALL AND CLASSROOMS.THE BELL GOES AFTER WE HAVE A LITTLE PLAY.WE LINE UP IN OUR LINES AND GO IN.WE DO SOME WORK AND THEN HAVE TEN MINUTES PLAYTIME.THE THING WHAT I LIKE ABOUT SCHOOL IS P.E. WE HAVE IT THREE TIMES A WEEK.THE BELL GOES AT 12.00 FOR DINNER SOME PEOPLE GO FIRST AND SOME PEOPLE GO SECOND FOR THEIR DINNERS.THE PEOPLE WHO TAKE PACKED LUNCH GO AND AFTER THAT WE HAVE ANOTHER PLAYTIME THEN A STORY AND GO HOME. JANE WILLIS.
